title: Friday Feast with PA & Charch!
description: Full feast! A Brady/Gretzky bit begins the show, then Wild coach Dean Evason joins as his team returns to the ice today....Former Gophers WR/Super Bowl champ Tyler Johnson and his agent Blake Baratz join for a couple segments, before Chad Greenway finishes the 10a hour...Final stretch includes an apoplectic Softy from Seattle on the Seahawks, Vikings QB coach Andrew Janocko and more!
